[ library(cgi) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

get_param_value(+NameValuePairs, +Name, ?Value)

Look up the value of a posted parameter

Description

Look up the value of a posted parameter. Returns an empty string if there is no parameter with the given name. Name must be an atom.

See Also

posted_params / 1, substitute_placeholders / 3
